original_title: REDEFINING THE OUTSIDER: SAUL RUBINEK IN EARLY CANADIAN FILM AND TELEVISION
overview: AVAILABLE TO VIEW ACROSS CANADA TJFF pays tribute to the beloved and influential actor/writer/director. In addition to the special in-person event, An Afternoon with Saul Rubinek, TJFF presents a FREE online screening series full of rare titles from the CBC archiveâ€”Rubinek as small-town detective Benny Cooperman investigating a crime in Algonquin Park; early pilots featuring Saul alongside Martin Short, Eugene Levy and Dave Thomas from their pre-SCTV days; and more.
title: REDEFINING THE OUTSIDER: SAUL RUBINEK IN EARLY CANADIAN FILM AND TELEVISION
